Safety shoes model no.1 S1P size 39 - 46
description.long_desc:
High-quality functional leather work shoes of category II. These shoes are designed to protect the feet from external factors and are engineered to maximize comfort and safety during work. The footwear complies with the standard specifying requirements for safety footwear: CE EN ISO 20345:2011.


Product Characteristics:



  • Black shoes, made from durable cowhide leather

  • Protective footwear category for work use - S1P

  • They have antistatic properties

  • Non-slip polyurethane soles

  • Steel toe cap for additional toe protection

  • Lining made of breathable multilayer mesh fabric - ensures good ventilation

  • EVA - padding to prevent abrasions

  • Provides energy absorption in the heel area

  • Reinforced covered heel

  • Metallic anti-penetration insert

  • Has anti-slip properties (SRC)

  • Option to replace the insole

  • Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345:2011


Technical Data:



  • Shoe protection category: S1P

  • Steel toe cap: YES

  • Upper: Cowhide Leather

  • Liner: Breathable Multilayer Fabric

  • Sole: Polyurethane PU (two different densities of polyurethane)

  • Replaceable insole: yes

  • Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345:2011


Size Chart:

High-quality, functional, Category II leather work shoes. These shoes are designed to protect the feet from external factors, engineered in a way to enhance comfort and safety during work. The footwear complies with a standard specifying requirements for safety footwear: CE EN ISO 20345:2011.

description.name: Safety shoes sandal model no. 8 S1P size 39 - 46
description.long_desc:
High-quality functional leather work sandals of category II. These shoes are designed to protect the feet from external factors, engineered in a way to maximize comfort and work safety. The footwear complies with a standard specifying requirements for safety footwear: CE EN ISO 20345:2011.


Product Characteristics:



  • Work sandals in black, made from durable bovine leather

  • Perfect for summer

  • Category of protective footwear for use at work – S1P

  • Have antistatic properties

  • Slip-resistant polyurethane soles

  • Steel toe cap for enhanced toe protection

  • Metal insole for anti-penetration

  • Sole made of breathable multilayer mesh fabric – provides good ventilation

  • EVA – padding preventing abrasions

  • Provides energy absorption in the heel part

  • Reinforced covered heel

  • Has SRC anti-slip properties

  • Possibility to replace the insole

  • Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345:2011


Technical Data:



  • Category of shoe protection: S1P

  • Steel toe cap: YES

  • Upper: bovine leather

  • Liner: breathable multilayer fabric

  • Sole: Polyurethane PU (two different densities of polyurethane)

  • Replaceable insole: yes

  • Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345:2011

description.name: Universal Socket Adapter CrV 11-32 + Power Drill Adapter
description.long_desc:
Universal socket was designed to automatically adjust to fit any nut or bolt from 7-19 mm (1/4 inches to 3/4 inches). Works with various shapes of screws, nuts, hooks, lag screws, eye screws, bolt heads and even broken, stripped and rusted nuts.


Product Features



  • Includes a 3/8" power adapter for electric drill or screwdriver

  • 54 steel pins automatically adjusts to any shape


Technical Data



  • Size Range: 7 - 19 mm / 1/4 - 3/4 in.

  • Socket Length: 52 mm

  • Drive Size: 3/8 inch

  • Drive Type: Square

  • Material: Chrome Vanadium Steel
